ifShowButtonLabel.message: Pop up a button when selecting text

ifCheckLangLabel.message: Do not display the button if the selected text is the same as the target language

ifChangeSecondLangLabel.message: Switch to the second language if the input text of the tool bar translation panel is the same as the target language
